name: frontend
description: 1) Open terminal in VSCode via **Terminal** -> **New Terminal** from the top menus. 2) Make sure that directory path is current project directory. 3) Enter command `git switch master`. 4) Enter command `git add .`. 5) Enter command `git commit -m "brief message"`. The `"brief message"` can be replaced with any message of your choice (e.g.`"added update to homepage"`). 6) Enter command `git push origin master`.
